bjhong02 wrote:

>In previous examples, the seed is www.uiuc.edu, the crawling stoped
>after dns lookup.
>
>I also did another test, the seed is www.yahoo.com.cn, there's no
>www.yahoo.com.cn/robots.txt, and the crawl carried on. I terminated it
>after a very short time. the follows are error log. (some robots.txt
>exist, some not)
>
>local-errors.log for yahoo  	 Displaying: 43.8% of 9 KB  	 
>  
>
The below are from the local-errors log.  The timeouts on a fetch of 
non-existent robots.txt are part of 'normal' operation.  Your uiuc.edu 
case is interesting because it fails to proceed after the timeout.  
There is no metatag barring crawls in your home page and wget has no 
problem fetching the robots.txt -- so, yeah, please send your order.xml 
and seeds.txt and we'll try them from here.
Thanks,
St.Ack
